name: 7th Dragon 2020-II
description:
7th Dragon 2020-II is a RPG game developed by Imageepoch. It was originally released in 2013. It was published by SEGA. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
7th Dragon 2020-II is available on PSP.
It was produced by Rieko Kodama. Kazuya Niinou directed the game. It was scored by Yuzo Koshiro.
